Name: The Packages
About the game: A puzzle game with great challenges and enjoyable environment. Simple and intuitive with easy interactions. The mechanics and gameplay are very simple, You just need to complete all the request to finish th level. Try collect all 3 stars, but of couse it's not easy ;) Click to change direction or Click+Drag to set direction Remember, you need to complete all requests to level up. 62 Levels 10 Package colors 16 Steam Achievements Minimalist game concept Relaxing experience Beautiful 3D graphics Simple and intuitive interface Easy interactions Great challenges Quality adjustments Thanks for supporting. I hope you like it and thank you for playing! Credits Lead Programmer: Thiago Mezanini Bertoni Programmer: Rene Mezanini Bertoni Game Designer: Gabriel Yuji QA: Guilherme Rodrigues Bertoni
